{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Pixie Plate |image = [[File:Pixie_Plate_Updated.png|150px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Pixie Plate''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Dungeons]] |value = 100 {{Gem|Fairy}} }} ==Description== The '''Pixie Plate''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Pixie Plate has a value of 100 [[Gems|Fairy Gems]] {{Gem|Fairy}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Acquisition== Pixie Plates can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Hall of Origin|Epic}} {{LootItem|Team Flare Secret HQ|Epic}} {{LootItem|Pokémon Village|Epic}} {{LootItem|Vast Poni Canyon|Epic}} {{LootItem|Mina's Houseboat|Epic}} {{LootItem|Ruins of Conflict|Epic}} {{LootItem|Ruins of Life|Epic}} {{LootItem|Ruins of Hope|Epic}} {{LootItem|Poni Meadow|Epic}} |} |} {{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Gems]]
revision.comment: Updating to match new version of source page
